title: Starwatching
alt: I always figured the word 'blog' would sound *less* silly as the years went by.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are lying on the ground stargazing]
Cueball: Just look at those stars.Cueball: My father once told me that the great bloggers of the past are up there, watching over us.[Cueball sits up, and then stands up, stretching his arms in the air as if to encompass the whole night sky]
Cueball: High above the blogosphere, a gap opens in the tag clouds. Cory Doctorow's voice booms forth...
Megan: You need to get out either more or less. I can't decide.
